channel.title: Revision Updates - Announcements
channel.description: Introducing the ultimate iTunes U Course for all of your A-Level revision needs. This feed is aimed specifically at our announcements regarding the progression and any developments of our iTunes U Web course.

item.title: Announcement
item.description: Just to let you know, we will be publishing Revision Updates A-Level Edition officially as apart of our public release on the 27th August 2015 (although we will start adding people from the 20th). As apart of the release with v2.0 revision updates we will be offering a new standard of resources that are specifically designed for all of your A-Level needs. We have an ever-expanding database of resources that we will be making available from day one.
